tweet: @RedMummy was it down for long? There would definitely have been a drop as they changed the voice wiring.
@RedMummy absolutely it should. Phone line is split at exchange - one pair of wires for voice, on for net. They can easily go different ways
@RedMummy it's sortable. Suggest you call both providers for advice, starting with BT
@RedMummy they should have left the broadband connection in place. "should" being the operative word
@RedMummy in switching voice providers you'll have been disconnected from BT in the exchange and connected to new provider hardware.
